# 4.43
pilot: 50*0.25=12.5
null:  50*0.10=5
data:  50*0.65=32.5
10,10,30: 50!/(10!*10!*30!)*0.25^10*0.1^10*0.65^30=0.002026
12.5-2*sqrt(50*0.25*0.75)=6.376276
12.5+2*sqrt(50*0.25*0.75)=18.623724

# 4.45
20!/(7!*5!*2!*0!*1!*5!)*0.3^7*0.1^5*0.07^2*0.07^0*0.08^1*0.38^5=0.000114
.7^20+20*.3*.7^19+20!/(2!*18!)*.3^2*.7^18=0.035483

# 4.47
0.65^8=0.031864
8!/(4!*3!*1!)*0.65^4*0.15^3*0.2^1=0.033738
8*.65=5.2

# 4.49
4*n*p_1+n*p_2

# 4.53
(Y-1)!/(9!*(Y-10)!)*0.2^10*0.8^(Y-10)
(25-1)!/(9!*(25-10)!)*0.2^10*0.8^(25-10)=0.004711

# 4.55
Geometric Probability
2.5
0.6/(0.4^2)=3.75
2.5-2*sqrt(3.75)=-1.372983
2.5+2*sqrt(3.75)=6.372983

# 4.57
1*.25+2*.2+3*.13+4*.13+5*.1+6*.05+7*.047+8*.048+9*.047+10*.025+11*.01+12*.005+13*.002+14*.001+15*.001=3.971
1/3.971=0.251826
0.251826*(1-0.251826)^6=0.044169

# 4.59
63
sqrt((62/63)/(1/63)^2)=62.498
63-2*62.498=-61.996
63+2*62.498=187.996

# 4.61
.3+.3*.7+.3*.7^2=0.657
1/.3=3.333333
sqrt(.7/.3^2)=2.788867
3.333333-2*2.788867=-2.244401
3.333333+2*2.788867=8.911067
.3^2+2*.3^2*.7+3*0.3^2*.7^2+4*.3^2*.7^3+5*.3^2*.7^4+6*0.3^2*.7^5=0.670583
